bibl.title: Some Legionary Centurions.
bibl.note: See pp. 120-128: analysis of the inscription (A.D. 157) from the fortress of the legio II Traiana at Nicopolis, near Alexandria (A.E. 1955, 238), including an alphabetical list of the 47 centurions for whom nomen and cognomen are given.
bibl.seg: See pp. 120-128: analysis of the inscription (A.D. 157) from the fortress of the legio II Traiana at Nicopolis, near Alexandria (A.E. 1955, 238), including an alphabetical list of the 47 centurions for whom nomen and cognomen are given.
